column5: Can anyone give us their experience with Rusty Myers Flying Service?We are looking at using their services this July. If we use them we will probably go to their outpost at Hilltop Lake. Any comments will be greatly appreciated.Also any fishing tips would be great!Thanks!

I went on my first outpost flyin trip with RMFS 10 years ago, and have to say I was pretty pleased, pilots were good, and the food was conveniently included. We hired them to fly us into a 3rd party resort a few years later. I have not been to Hilltop however.
